#!/bin/bash

# Bash shell script to invoke Azure Data Factory with the az CLI
# to execute pipeline '{{ p['name'] }}'. 
#
# Generated on:  {{ gen_timestamp }}
# Generated by:  {{ gen_by }}
# Template:      adf_az_cli.txt

source env.sh

az datafactory pipeline create-run \
    --factory-name $M2C_ADF_NAME \
    --resource-group $M2C_RG \
    --parameters "{}" \
    --name {{ p['name'] }}

echo 'done'
